name: Variation of Variation on Caesar Cipher: Rot13
description:
Check out the kata on Rot13 before you do this one.

You bascially have to replace each letter with the its 4 characters in the same case.

Any other characters you just leave it there (!@#$%^&a* <>?) just returns (!@#$%^&bcde* <>)

e.g. ```a``` would return ```bcde```

e.g. ```b  x``` would return ```cdef  yzab```

e.g. ```1ab ``` would return ```1bcdecdef ```

e.g. ```A,b C.d/e56F/ZXY``` would return ```BCDE,cdef DEFG.efgh/fghi56GHIJ/ABCDYZABZABC```
